meanings.definition: Surrounding or encompassing on all sides.
meanings.sent1: The circumambient forest provided a sense of security.
meanings.sent2: The stars in the circumambient sky twinkled brightly.
meanings.sent3: The circumambient trees seemed to whisper secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like a circumambient aura.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of the circumambient fog was eerie yet comforting.

meanings.sent1: The circumambient sounds of the city never ceased.
meanings.sent2: The warmth of the circumambient sunlight enveloped us.
meanings.sent3: The circumambient smell of fresh bread made everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: His influence was like a circumambient presence in the office.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the circumambient landscape took our breath away.
